title: Manohari Diamond and Emerald Haaram Set with Jhumka
materials: adorned with meticulously set brilliant-cut Diamonds
and lustrous South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This exquisite Haaram showcases a classic U-shaped design, meticulously crafted with alternating diamond and emerald motifs. Delicate pearl drops enhance the necklace's graceful flow. The centerpiece features a floral pendant with a central Ruby, surrounded by diamonds and emeralds, echoing the overall design. Matching Jhumka earrings complete the set, mirroring the Haaram's intricate details and pearl accents.
colors: Predominantly gold with sparkling diamond accents
complemented by the rich green of the emeralds
the deep red of the ruby
and the soft cream of the pearls
creating a harmonious and opulent palette.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (Vivaha Mahotsavam)
and celebratory events (Shubhakaryalu). An exquisite choice for a bride (Vadhuvu) or as a special gift for milestone celebrations.
description: This Haaram set is a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and timeless design. The combination of diamonds, emeralds, and pearls exudes elegance and luxury. It's a heirloom piece that can be cherished for generations, symbolizing prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish ensures lasting brilliance. The set is designed to complement traditional South Indian attire, adding a touch of regal splendor.
